search_string.description: Search string to filter businesses by name or other text fields

business_type.description: Type of business to filter by

startup_certificate.description: Filter by startup certificate status (1 for yes, 0 for no)

invite_start_date.description: Start date for invitation period filter

invite_end_date.description: End date for invitation period filter

services.description: List of service IDs to filter by

deal_labels_id.description: List of deal label IDs to filter by

census.description: List of census IDs to filter by

opportunity_start_date.description: Start date for opportunity period filter

opportunity_end_date.description: End date for opportunity period filter

paid_start_date.description: Start date for paid period filter

paid_end_date.description: End date for paid period filter

discarded_start_date.description: Start date for discarded period filter

discarded_end_date.description: End date for discarded period filter

updated_start_date.description: Start date for updated period filter

updated_end_date.description: End date for updated period filter

recurrent_start_date.description: Start date for recurrent period filter

recurrent_end_date.description: End date for recurrent period filter

products.description: List of product IDs to include

products_out_id.description: List of product IDs to exclude

services_out_id.description: List of service IDs to exclude

has_assigned_client.description: Filter for businesses with assigned client

with_bank_account.description: Filter for businesses with bank account

with_fiscal_documents.description: Filter for businesses with fiscal documents

gocardless_active.description: Filter for businesses with active GoCardless

sage_active.description: Filter for businesses with active Sage

min_invoices_last_6_months_incomes.description: Minimum amount of incomes from invoices in last 6 months

max_invoices_last_6_months_incomes.description: Maximum amount of incomes from invoices in last 6 months

min_transactions_last_6_months_incomes.description: Minimum amount of incomes from transactions in last 6 months

max_transactions_last_6_months_incomes.description: Maximum amount of incomes from transactions in last 6 months

request.description:
<llm-instruction>This part of the input schema is truncated. If you want to pass the property `request` to the tool, first call the tool `expandSchema` with "/properties/request" in the list of pointers. This will return the expanded input schema which you can then use in the tool call. You may have to call `expandSchema` multiple times if the schema is nested.</llm-instruction>
<property-description>Additional filtering criteria</property-description>
